Spanish: Bienvenido a la Beta de Truck City

English: Please provide feedback by completing the following [FF5454FF]Survey[-]:
Spanish: Por favor danos tu feedback completando la siguiente [FF5454FF]Encuesta[-]:

English:
Welcome to [FF5454FF]Truck City[-].

Your Job is to Deliver Cargo from one place to another.
Spanish: Bienvenido a [FF5454FF]Truck City[-].\n\nTu tarea es llevar carga de un sitio a otro.

English: [EE82EE]Pink Cargo[-] has to be delivered to -

Spanish: Y lo mismo para el [8B6914]Cargamento Marrón[-]!

English: For that you will use these [FF5454FF]trucks[-]
Trucks are stupid, You will have to touch on certain roads to [FF5454FF]rotate[-] them in order to guide their path
Spanish: Los camiones son estúpidos. Tendrás que [FF5454FF]tocar[-] en ciertas carreteras para rotarlas y guiar su camino"

English: This is a turnable road, a [5DFC0A]Green Road[-]
Spanish: Esta es una Carretera girable, en concreto, una [5DFC0A]Carretera Verde[-]

English: [5DFC0A]Green Roads[-] are simple, they rotate 90 degrees each time you touch them
Spanish: Las [5DFC0A]Carreteras Verdes[-] son sencillas, se giran 90 grados cada vez que las tocas

English: You will receive [FFE600]Stars[-] every time you complete Missions
Spanish: Recibirás [FFE600]Estrellas[-] cada vez que completes una misión

English: [FFE600]Stars[-] allow you to unlock more levels
You can find the Missions at the beginning of each level and in the pause menu
Spanish: Puedes encontrar las Misiones de cada nivel al principio de cada uno, y en el menú de pause

English: And a quick look on Missions over here too
Lastly, each level will feature a timer to accomplish the level
Spanish: Finalmente, cada nivel tiene un temporizador aquí

English: As you saw before, There are more than one kinds of cargo\nBut also, the are more kind of turnable roads
Spanish: Como se vio anteriormente, Hay mas de un tipo de cargamento\nPero también hay mas tipos de carreteras que se pueden rotar

English: It has the property that one of the sides is locked, and the other one moves after each touch
Spanish: Tiene la propiedad de que uno de los lados de la carretera no se mueve, mientras que el otro lo hace tras cada toque

English: Observe the position of the icon
This road is anchored on its West side
Spanish: Esta carretera está anclada por su lado Oeste

English: And this one is anchored on its East side
Spanish: Y esta está anclada por su lado Este

English: Beware! On this level you now control 2 trucks!
[009ACD]Blue Roads[-] are straight roads that alternate between an horizontal road and a vertical road upon touching them
Spanish: Las [009ACD]Carreteras Azules[-] son carreteras rectas que se alternan entre una carretera horizontal y vertical cuando se las toca

English: Getting all the [FFE600]Stars[-] on this level might be a little harder than before
Spanish: Conseguir todas las [FFE600]Estrellas[-] en este nivel puede ser mas difícil que antes

English: Don't despair! You can restart at any time from the pause menu
Spanish: No desesperes! Puedes reiniciar en cualquier momento desde el menú de pause

English: The [C1CDCD]?[-] icon on the pause menu will close the menu while the game is stopped, so you can plan your strategy\nAlso you can repeat this tutorial from there
Spanish: El icono [C1CDCD]?[-] del menú de pause cerrará dicho menú manteniendo el  juego pausado, de manera que puedas planear tu estrategia\nAdemas, desde allí podrás repetir este tutorial

English: Also, remember that Trucks can turn around when they cannot enter to the next road
Spanish: Además, recuerda que los camiones también pueden dar la vuelta cuando no pueden entrar a la siguiente carretera!

English: [FF5454FF]Time is really important[-] on this one
Factories not always produce infinite amounts of Cargo
Spanish: Las factorías no siempre producen cargamento infinito

English: Sometimes they store a limited amount of Cargo Items
Spanish: A veces almacenan una cantidad limitada de Carga

English: And produces [FF5454FF]more[-] cargo every once in a while when it's capacity isn't full
Spanish: Y producen [FF5454FF]más[-] cargamento cada cierto tiempo cuando no están llenos

English: Try to synchronize the arrival of your trucks with the production times of the factories
Spanish: Intenta sincronizar la llegada de tus camiones con la producción de las factorías

English: For that: sometimes it's better to make your Trucks to lose some time
Spanish: Para ello: a veces es mejor hacer que tus camiones pierdan el tiempo

English: Each Delivery yields different amounts of money
Spanish: Cada envío da una cantidad diferente de dinero

English: Make a good decision to where send your trucks!
Spanish: Decide donde deben ir tus camiones!

English: These are [FF5454FF]Road Blocks[-] they block one lane of the Road
Spanish: Estos son [FF5454FF]Bloqueos[-] y bloquean un carril

English: Your Trucks will [FF5454FF]Turn Around[-] when encountering a Road Block
Spanish: Tus camiones [FF5454FF]Darán la vuelta[-] cuando se encuentren con un Bloqueo.

English: Try to use it on your advantage
Also, this [FFFFFF]white icon[-] means this factory accepts any kind of cargo
Spanish: Ademas,este [FFFFFF]icono blanco[-] significa que esta fabrica acepta cualquier tipo de cargamento

English: On this level we have added one more truck!
Spanish: En este nivel hemos añadido un nuevo camión!

English: Worry not, overall speed is slower
But don't sleep or trucks will run wild!
Spanish: Pero presta atención o los camiones se te descontrolaran
